name: notion-snippets
title: Notion Snippets
description: 🚀 Manage and access code snippets stored in your Notion database with lightning-fast search and seamless team collaboration
author: your-raycast-username

commands.name: search-snippets
commands.title: Search Snippets
commands.subtitle: Notion Snippets
commands.description: Search and copy code snippets from your Notion database

commands.name: add-snippet
commands.title: Add Snippet
commands.subtitle: Notion Snippets
commands.description: Add a new code snippet to your Notion database

commands.name: setup-helper
commands.title: Setup Helper
commands.subtitle: Notion Snippets
commands.description: 🛠️ Setup guide and database ID extractor for easy configuration

preferences.name: notionApiKey
preferences.title: 🔑 Notion API Key
preferences.description: Your Notion integration secret token. Create one at: https://www.notion.com/my-integrations

preferences.name: snippetDatabaseId
preferences.title: 🗄️ Database ID
preferences.description: Copy the database ID from your Notion snippets database URL (32-character string between workspace name and ?v=). Example: notion.so/workspace/DATABASE_ID?v=...

preferences.name: notionDatabaseUrl
preferences.title: 📋 Database URL (Helper)
preferences.description: Paste your full Notion database URL here to easily extract the Database ID above

preferences.name: defaultLanguage
preferences.title: 🌐 Default Language
preferences.description: Default programming language for new snippets

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \"prepublishOnly\" script and rerun \"npm publish\" again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \"npm run publish\" instead.

" && exit 1
